mapper.insert: insert into FAQ(faq_category_code, faq_subcategory_id, faq_title, faq_content, writer, is_post) values(#{faq_category_code}, #{faq_subcategory_id}, #{faq_title}, #{faq_content}, #{writer}, #{is_post})
mapper.select: select faq_id, faq_category_code, faq_subcategory_id, faq_title, faq_content, create_datetime, modify_datetime, writer, modifier, is_post from FAQ order by faq_id asc

select f.faq_id, f.faq_category_code, f.faq_subcategory_id, s.standard_code_name as faq_category_name, sc.faq_subcategory_name as faq_subcategory_name, f.faq_title, f.faq_content, f.create_datetime, f.modify_datetime, f.writer, f.modifier, f.is_post from FAQ f join Standard_Code s on f.faq_category_code = concat(s.standard_code_type_id, s.standard_code) join FAQ_SubCategory sc on f.faq_subcategory_id = sc.faq_subcategory_id and f.faq_category_code = sc.faq_category_code where is_post = 'Y' and faq_id=#{faq_id} order by faq_id desc
